RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 25. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADYBUGGIN saved ground into the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead near the furlong marker and proved best by a narrow margin in a game effort. GO RAY chased the early pace, rallied three wide wide into the stretch, bumped with the leader when struck with a right handed whip before the furlong marker, gained a narrow lead then couldn't handle the winner. RIVERANDFAIRMOUNT hopped at the start and finished with good courage four wide. SEE YA SISTA away alertly, set the pace into the stretch, was bumped nearing the furlong marker then faded. HONEYBEE STINGS bore in badly at the start bumping LISTEN LINDA LOU, had speed into the turn then weakened. LISTEN LINDA LOU was bumped and forced in at the start then trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Listen Linda Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, forced in start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybee Stings
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in badly, bumped start, speed turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: See Ya Sista
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, bumped, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverandfairmount
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, finished well, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Ladybuggin
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, long drive, proved best, gamely,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Peter J. Sheppell & Bradley G. Buchholtz

ENTRY.NAME: Go Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied 3w, bumped upper stretch, narrow lead, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 98. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 5 Allowed 4 lb s. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAUDA SPEED broke in front, set all the pace and edged clear under left handed urging. MASAI MAN never far back, rallied along the inside late and got up for second. ZELIG stumbled inward bumping CHACO SPIRIT at the start, loomed boldly four wide on the turn then was outfinished. CUTLER vied for the lead two then three wide and went evenly. MONTAUK COVE pressured the winner two then three wide and lacked the needed response. ADHHAR was no factor. CHACO SPIRIT was bumped at the start, had speed for a half then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Masai Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied inside, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Adhhar
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Cutler
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 2 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Chaco Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, speed half, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Zelig
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled inward, bumped start, strong bid turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, edged clear, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2-3wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUFFIN had had speed from the start, angled outside the leader before the half mile marker, rallied to make the lead two wide on the turn then finished full of run to win going away under strong handling. CITY SCENE inside speed, was in tight at the nine sixteenths pole, steadied and altered course to the five path, had a mild late rally and finished second best. HOTTIE SPOTTIE away alertly, loomed boldly three wide on the turn then was outfinished. VILLIAN failed to menace. PRAYED TODAY broke slowly and was no threat. SALTMAKESHERSWEET sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace into the turn then flattened out.

ENTRY.NAME: Prayed Today
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: City Scene
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight 9/16pole, altered course 5path, late rally, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Ruffin
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, surged 2 wide turn, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Saltmakeshersweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Villian
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hamm Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Hottie Spottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 61. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 5 Allowed4 lbs. ( Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY JASPER chased her stablemate for four and one half furlongs, assumed command two wide, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch under strong handling to win as much the best. STEALTH MODE away alertly, set the pace along the inside to the seven sixteenths pole then was no match for the winner. DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT saved ground and went evenly. BIRDIE'S CHANTZ offered a mild bid three wide nearing the half mile marker then came up empty. WEEKENDING hopped hitting the gate at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Dominique's Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Stealth Mode
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside 7/16pole, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasper
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, quick move, 2 wide, drew off, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & Choice OneBloodstock

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie's Chantz
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Weekending
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, hit gate start, trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 92. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 5 Allowed 4 lb s. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLIPPING FISH stalked the early pace, rallied three wide through the turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch then drew off to win in hand while much the best. HAGLER trailed into the stretch, closed willingly in the six path and finished second best. OTIS OTIS OTIS had a brief early lead, prompted the pace two wide until deep stretch then was, outfinished. OVER THE HILLS sprinted to the lead before a quarter, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then weakened late. ICON failed to menace. FRONTLINER advanced along the rail through the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Icon
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Hagler
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly 6path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace upper stretch, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Flipping Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide turn,, drew off, much best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Frontliner
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Otis Otis Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead, pressed 2 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 47. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 5 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.7 ,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS ELLIE away alertly, set a pressured pace three then two wide into the stretch and drew clear under a strong hand ride. PATTI LOU trailed into the turn, swung wide, closed determinedly in the six path and finished clear for second. TALE OF THE LYON pressured the winner along the inside into the turn, shifted outside that one to the three path then was outfinished. SHANGHAI ROYALTY failed to menace. BUSYBEING FABULOUS improved position three wide on the turn then weakened in the stretch. CRYPTONIC CATWALK was no factor. SPUN PRETTY pressed the early pace between horses two wide, had speed through the turn then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Tale of the Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, angled out 3path top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Spun Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses, 2 wide, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Cryptonic Catwalk
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, 3-2wide, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Busybeing Fabulous
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position 3 wide turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Patti Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, closed 6path, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce May 5 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 5 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAKE RADIO battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch, gained the lead when put to a right handed stick nearing the furlong marker and drew clear under strong handling. STORMIN'UNCLEJACK stalked the pace three wide and finished second best. WHISTLEWHILEYOUMOW went evenly. OBIWAN close up four wide, faded in the stretch. IRISH UNITY contested the lead two wide into the stretch and weakened late along the rail. FRANCO was outrun. BREEZY MONEY was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Radio
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, inside, shook clear, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormin'unclejack
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Franco
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Unity
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, weakened late rail

ENTRY.NAME: Whistlewhileyoumow
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Obiwan
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 5 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not C onsidered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CYCLONE unhurried early, got through along the rail while rallying through the stretch and was along in time. LAST COOKIE was hung fie wide early, rallied three wide making the lead on the far turn, set the pace until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. DOWNTOWN CONNECTOR prompted the early pace along the inside, made the lead after leaving the first turn, was headed before a half, matched strides into the far turn, checked nearing the quarter pole, swung wide, got out through the stretch and was outfinished while well past the middle of the racetrack. TIMESATAPPIN trailed for four and one half furlongs then had a mild rally late along the inside. AZTEC wide early, made the lead five wide before a half, angled in three then two wide while setting the pace through the far turn, battled until deep stretch then came up empty. RED COMET had brief speed. MAN'S CHOICE pressed the pace three wide and was through early. SHACK THE LIFE set the tempo through the first turn, stopped abruptly after a half, jogged into the stretch, fell late and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Shack the Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, stopped 2nd turn, fell deep stretch, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Red Comet
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Downtown Connector
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, led, checked near 1/4pole, got out, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, got through, inside, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Man's Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Timesatappin
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild rally late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Last Cookie
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide early, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Aztec
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, led backstretch, 2nd turn, empty,
